title: Matplotlib Annotation Tutorial
description: Matplotlib is a powerful visualization tool that allows users to create a wide variety of plots and charts. Annotations are an important feature of Matplotlib that allow users to add text and arrows to their plots. In this tutorial, we will learn how to use different coordinate systems for annotations.
